div.p: Letter book 2, no. 60, Melbourne General Cemetery.
MS annotation by Purchas: 'Read | 11-5-70 | A.P.'. See also A. Purchas to M, 26 April 1870, and A. Purchas to M, 28 May 1870. Bot Gard. 28/4/70

It will afford me much pleasure, dear Mr Purchas, to supply again this season plants to the Cemetery, as far as they are available. I hope however, that in justice to my establishment this new and my former gifts will be publicly acknowledged.

div.p:
Ferd. von Mueller M.D.
The minutes of a meeting of the Trustees held on 11 May 1870 record: 'Read reply to application to Dr Mueller for plants, granting the same, and hoping that they would be publicly acknowledged' (minute book 1).
